metadata.description:
A three-issue limited series.

IN 2027, CRIME AND DELINQUENCY SOARED IN THE UNITED STATES. PRISONS ARE OVERCROWDED. The American government created a new type of prison, settled in an abyssal pit off Bermuda, for the most dangerous prisoners. 900 meters under the sea level, there is no chance of escape!
metadata.name: Deepwater Prison
